markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clone-Risen](/Feats.aspx?ID=3792) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Reflection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=431" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 120</row>

</column>

---

You were formed from a [_clone_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=30) ritual or alchemical experiment. Created as a vessel for another creature, you can suppress your sentience momentarily, making your mind harder to alter. You gain the Empty Vessel reaction.

 **Empty Vessel** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You would take mental damage or be affected by a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect; **Effect** You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Will saves and resistance to mental damage equal to your level against the triggering effect. This applies only to the initial effect, not successive saves, [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), or other repeated effects.

<title level="2">Clone-Risen leads to...</title>
[Replicate](/Feats.aspx?ID=3799)
name: Clone-Risen
